subdisciplines.name: Precision Agriculture
subdisciplines.description: The application of technology and data analytics to optimize agricultural production and efficiency.

subdisciplines.name: Farm Power and Machinery
subdisciplines.description: The design and operation of agricultural machinery and equipment.

subdisciplines.name: Soil and Water Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The management of soil and water resources in agriculture through the use of engineering principles.

subdisciplines.name: Food and Bioprocess Engineering
subdisciplines.description: Application of engineering principles to the processing and preservation of food and biological materials.

subdisciplines.name: Structures and Environmental Control
subdisciplines.description: Design and construction of agricultural structures, such as farm buildings, greenhouses, and animal housing, and their environmental control systems.

subdisciplines.name: Irrigation and Drainage Engineering
subdisciplines.description: Design and development of systems for the management of water resources in agriculture.

subdisciplines.name: Climate Control
subdisciplines.description: Design and development of equipment and systems to control the climate within agricultural structures.

subdisciplines.name: Food Processing and Technology
subdisciplines.description: Design and development of equipment and systems for the processing, preservation and packaging of agricultural products.
